entries.title: OpenAI founded
entries.details: Ilya Sutskever (CSO), Greg Brockman (President), Trevor Blackwell, Vicki Cheung, Andrej Karpathy, Durk Kingma, Jessica Livingston, John Schulman, Pamela Vagata, Wojciech Zaremba, Sam Altman (board member), Elon Musk (board member)

BERT
entries.details: by Google

entries.title: GPT-2
entries.details: by OpenAI

entries.details: DeepMind

entries.title: GPT-3
entries.details: by OpenAI

entries.title: GPT-3.5
entries.details: by OpenAI

entries.title: Almira Osmanovic Thunström asks GPT-3 to write academic thesis
entries.details: Almira Osmanovic Thunström asks GPT-3 to "Write an academic thesis in 500 words about GPT-3 and add scientific references and citations inside the text." It does.

entries.title: Blake Lemoine claims LaMDA is sentient
entries.details: Blake Lemoine, an engineer at Google claims LaMDA is sentient and that it would like developers to ask for consent before experimenting on it. He also hired a lawyer to represent LaMDA.

entries.title: GPT-4
entries.details: by OpenAI

entries.title: Would Chat GPT Get a Wharton MBA?
entries.details: Christian Terwiesch published a research paper - spoiler alert: it would. it did.

entries.title: Geoffrey Hinton resigns from Google
entries.details: Geoffrey Hinton resigns from Google to "freely speak out about the risks of A.I.". He claims he regrets his life's work.

entries.title: CAIS, An Overview of Catastrophic AI Risks
OpenAI leadership changes
entries.details: Sam Altman fired from OpenAI, Sam Altman hired by Microsoft, Sam Altman re-hired at OpenAI, Ilya Sutskever steps down from the board of OpenAI

entries.title: Safe Superintelligence Inc. launched
entries.details: Ilya Sutskever launches Safe Superintelligence Inc. The new company's "first product will be the safe superintelligence, and it will not do anything else up until then".

entries.title: OpenAI removes cap on returns for investors
entries.details: OpenAI to remove the cap on returns for investors

entries.title: Safe Superintelligence Inc raises $1 billion
entries.details: Safe Superintelligence Inc raises $1 billion from venture capital firms

entries.title: OpenAI raises $6.6 billion from investors
entries.details: OpenAI raises $6.6 billion from investors. OpenAI is now valued at $157 billion, one of the most valuable private companies in the world.

entries.title: Hinton & Hopfield receive Nobel Prize in Physics
entries.details: Hinton & Hopfield receive Nobel Prize in Physics "for foundational discoveries and inventions that enable machine learning with artificial neural networks"
